actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL (n.n) MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS month,
  COUNT(*) AS subscriptions,
	ROUND( SUM( wp_edd_orders.total / 12 ), 2 ) as mrr
FROM
  wp_edd_orders
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT 1 n UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6
    UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12
  ) n
  ON wp_edd_orders.date_created BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL (n.n + 12) MONTH) AND DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL (n.n) MONTH)
  WHERE (wp_edd_orders.status = 'edd_subscription' OR wp_edd_orders.status = 'complete')
    AND wp_edd_orders.type = 'sale'
		AND wp_edd_orders.total <= 540
GROUP BY
  DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL (n.n) MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY
  month ASC
